title: Cinderella (Disney)
creator_credit: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske, Wilfred Jackson, Walt Disney, Ben Sharpsteen and Walt Disney Pictures
brief_description: Walt Disney’s animated version of Charles Perrault’s classic fairy story. Featuring beautiful colour animation and a lovely musical score this version of “Cinderella” is one of the Disney studios most charming and most loved cartoon features.
creator_credit_for_label: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske, Wilfred Jackson, Walt Disney, Ben Sharpsteen and Walt Disney Pictures
